name: Small Business Administration
description: The Small Business Administration helps Americans start, build and grow businesses by providing counseling, capital, and contracting expertise.

painPoints.point: Loan processing system modernization to improve speed and efficiency of small business loan applications
IT infrastructure modernization for disaster loan processing and small business certification systems
Small business contracting data collection and reporting system improvements
Cybersecurity enhancements for loan processing and business information systems
Disaster assistance program system scalability and performance improvements

IT acquisition and management challenges including project delays, budget overruns, and need for improved oversight and mature acquisition practices affecting loan processing and small business IT systems
painPoints.source: GAO High-Risk List 2025 - Improving IT Acquisitions and Management

keyOffices: Office of the Chief Information Officer (OCIO)
Office of Government Contracting and Business Development
insights: SBA itself is required to contract 100% with small businesses
Loan processing system modernization is a major focus
Disaster loan systems require scalability improvements
Strong emphasis on supporting other agencies' small business goals
IT infrastructure modernization priorities across programs
